segments.text: So how long have you know Jack ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We go way back.We ' Ve known each other since we were toddlers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? You guys must be really tight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , he is , but he can be conniving at times .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I know that he would never stab me in the back.But I've seen him double cross other people .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , my ! Really ? I never thought he would be like that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't get me wrong , I'm not saying he's like that all the time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , can I trust him or what ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I think you should decide for yourself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I need someone that I can count on for this job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , Okay.You can trust him . I was just trying to give you a hard time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on you're confusing me.Give it to me straight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , he's the most dependable person I know , and he would never turn on anyone .
segments.speaker: S2
